disclaimer: is in Early Preview ‚Äî This is an early version and currently in active development. Features and design are still evolving.
track_unlock_explore: Track your cubes, unlock badges, and explore the world's largest cube database.
ready_to_level_up: Ready to level up your cube game?
join_community: Join the CubeIndex community and start tracking your collection, unlocking achievements, and connecting with cubers worldwide.
cubingpanda_community: CubingPanda is the go-to community for Rubik's Cube fans at every skill level‚Äîwhether you're a veteran speedcuber or someone who's never solved a single face.
open_archive_algorithms: The open archive for cube algorithms. Browse community-vetted solutions across every puzzle type, tag them with your average-of-5, and share your PB-crushing secrets.

It seems you encountered an error.

confirm_sign_out_message: Are you sure you want to sign out?
base_version: The base version is the original or standard version of this cube model.
limited_version: Limited Edition versions are produced in restricted quantities and may feature unique colors, packaging, or other special characteristics.
trim_version: Trim versions are alternate variants of the base model, often with different colors, finishes, or minor features.
you_are_adding: You are adding the {cube_name} to your collection as {username}
check_email_reset: Check your email to reset your password
create_free_account: Create a free account to start tracking your collection
password_at_least_eight: Password must be at least 8 characters.
password_updated: Password updated. You can now log in.
about_description: CubeIndex is your ultimate speedcubing companion. Organize, explore, and showcase your cube collection ‚Äî all in one place.
about_feature_organize_desc: Keep track of your entire collection with ease.
about_feature_discover_desc: Explore popular, limited, and community submissions.
about_feature_track_desc: Earn badges and milestones for your cubing journey.
about_feature_community_desc: Contribute entries, rate cubes, and engage with fellow cubers.
construction_message: We're currently working hard to finish this part of the site. Check back soon for something awesome!
